actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means

official_title: To restore the tariff treatment accorded to hand cast string drawn fishing nets before implementation of the Harmonized Tariff Schedule.

summary.text: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to restore the tariff treatment accorded to hand cast string drawn fishing nets before implementation of such Schedule. Exempts such nets from quantitative restraints established under the Agricultural Adjustment Act of 1956.

titles.title: To restore the tariff treatment accorded to hand cast string drawn fishing nets before implementation of the Harmonized Tariff Schedule.
